titleStmt.title: An appendix to the antidote conteyning a catalogue of the visible and perpetuall succession of the Catholique professours of the Roman Church, by whom the doctrine now taught vnder Pope Gregory the XV hath beene in all ages, and countreyes, since Christ, constantly & vniformely maintayned : togeather with a counter-catalogue discouering the interruption of hereticall sectes, amongst whome the chiefe Protestant articles, and their authours, haue beene in diuers ages, vpon sundry occasions, contradicted, and condemned, by the watchmen of the true church / by S.N. Doctour of Diuinity.
titleStmt.author: S. N. (Sylvester Norris), 1572-1630.

notesStmt.note: "The Catholike Roman catalogue" and "The Counter-catalogue of sectaryes" on facing pages.
Imperfect: torn, with some page numbers lacking.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
